movies.title: The Goonies
movies.description: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient treasure.

movies.title: 3:10 To Yuma
movies.description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

movies.title: Snatch
movies.description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: Rushmore
movies.description: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

movies.title: Boxtrolls
movies.description: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator. Based on the children's novel "Here Be Monsters" by Alan Snow.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

tv_shows.title: Wayward Pines
tv_shows.description: A Secret Service agent goes to Wayward Pines, Idaho, in search of two federal agents who have gone missing in the bucolic town. He soon learns that he may never get out of Wayward Pines alive.

tv_shows.title: House Of Cards
tv_shows.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

tv_shows.title: Breaking Bad
tv_shows.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with a terminal lung cancer teams up with his former student to cook and sell crystal meth.

tv_shows.title: The X-Files
tv_shows.description: Two FBI agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

tv_shows.title: Cosmos
tv_shows.description: A documentary series that explores how we discovered the laws of nature and found our coordinates in space and time.

tv_shows.title: South Park
tv_shows.description: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.
